Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate two people communicating over a long distance using a string telephone.
The student can show how the string telephone uses sound to send and receive information.
The student can include labels or symbols to explain the parts of the string telephone, such as the cups and string.
The student can demonstrate that the device must be built with materials provided, like cups and string.
The student can add a short note or caption to describe how the string carries sound from one person to another.
The student can reflect on and write a brief description of what makes the string telephone work as a communication device.
